sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT STRING_AGG(name,'','') AS [Columns] 
FROM sys.columns 
WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(''[dbo].[Dim'
,pipeline().parameters.tableName
,']'')
AND column_id <> 1
AND name <> ''Hash'''
)
@CONCAT('select * from SalesLT.Product where ModifiedDate >= ', 'CAST(''' , activity('LKP - MaxDate').output.firstRow.MaxDate , ''' AS DateTime)')

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> ProductAbfs
source(output(
		ProductId as integer,
		Hash as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductDw
ProductAbfs select(mapColumn(
		ProductName = Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimColumns
SelectDimColumns derive(Hash = sha2(256,ProductName,ProductNumber,Color,StandardCost,ListPrice,Size)) ~> DerHash
ProductDw select(mapColumn(
		dw_ProductNumber = ProductNumber,
		dw_Hash = Hash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDwColumns
DerHash, SelectDwColumns join(ProductNumber == dw_ProductNumber,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDw
JoinDw filter(Hash != dw_Hash) ~> FilterPerimetre
FilterPerimetre alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(input(
		ProductId as integer,
		Hash as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ProductNumber'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Hash,
		ProductNumber,
		ProductName,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DestDimProduct

source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'Path',
	format: 'parquet') ~> ProductDeltaAbfs
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'Path',
	format: 'parquet') ~> ProductFullAbfs
ProductDeltaAbfs derive(FileName = regexExtract(Path, `([^/]+)(?=\.\w)`)) ~> DerFileNameDelta
ProductFullAbfs derive(FileName = regexExtract(Path, `([^/]+)(?=\.\w)`)) ~> DerFileNameFull
DerFileNameDelta, DerFileNameFull union(byName: true)~> UnionProduct
UnionProduct window(over(FileName,
		ProductID),
	desc(ModifiedDate, true),
	rank = rowNumber()) ~> WindowSort
WindowSort filter(rank == 1) ~> FilterNewRows
FilterNewRows alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(input(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	rowUrlColumn:'Path',
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDate,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate,
		Path,
		FileName,
		rank
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DestProductFull

source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(19,4),
		LineTotal as decimal(38,6),
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SalesOrderDetailAbfs
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		DueDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		Status as integer,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		PurchaseOrderNumber as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		CustomerID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		ShipMethod as string,
		CreditCardApprovalCode as string,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4),
		Comment as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SalesOrderHeaderAbfs
source(output(
		ProductId as integer,
		Hash as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductDw
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> ProductAbfs
SalesOrderDetailAbfs select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		SalesOrderDetailID,
		OrderQty,
		ProductID,
		UnitPrice,
		UnitPriceDiscount,
		LineTotal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSalesOrderDetailsAbfs
SalesOrderHeaderAbfs select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDate,
		DueDate,
		ShipDate,
		Status,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSalesOrderHeaderAbfs
ProductDw select(mapColumn(
		dw_ProductId = ProductId,
		dw_ProductNumber = ProductNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProductDw
SelectSalesOrderDetailsAbfs, SelectSalesOrderHeaderAbfs join(SelectSalesOrderDetailsAbfs@SalesOrderID == SelectSalesOrderHeaderAbfs@SalesOrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSalesOrderHeader
JoinSalesOrderHeader, JoinProductDwAbfs join(ProductID == dl_ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct
JoinProduct alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
ProductAbfs select(mapColumn(
		dl_ProductID = ProductID,
		dl_ProductNumber = ProductNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProductAbfs
SelectProductDw, SelectProductAbfs join(dw_ProductNumber == dl_ProductNumber,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProductDwAbfs
AlterRow sink(input(
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(19,4),
		Status as integer,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		PurchaseOrderNumber as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		ShipMethod as string,
		CreditCardApprovalCode as string,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		OrderQty,
		ProductID = dw_ProductId,
		UnitPrice,
		UnitPriceDiscount,
		Status,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DestFtSalesOrder

transformations.name: DrvHash
transformations.description:
Creating/updating the columns 'HashedColumns'

sha2(256,columns()) could be used

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	columns as string ('ProductNumber,ProductName,Color,StandardCost,ListPrice,Size'),
	BusinessKey as string ('ProductNumber')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SrcGeneric
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimGeneric
SrcGeneric derive(Hash = sha2(256,byNames(split($columns,',')))) ~> DrvHash
DrvHash, SelectDimKeys lookup(Hash == byName('Hash_dim'),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LKPExists
LKPExists split(isMatch(),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ExistingRows, NewOrUpdatedRows)
ConditionalSplit1@NewOrUpdatedRows alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
DimGeneric select(mapColumn(
		each(patternMatch(`Hash`),
			concat($$,'_dim') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimKeys
AlterRowUpsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:[($BusinessKey)],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		each(patternMatch(`^((?!_dim).)*$`))
	)) ~> sinkDimGeneric

properties.description: This is a generalized Slowly Changing Dimension Type 1 that is parameterized to work against different dimension tables and dimension types.

transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	dimname as string ('dimprods'),
	keycol as string ('ProductNumber'),
	SurrogateKey as string ('ProductID'),
	tablename as string ('DimProducts')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> NewMembers1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingMembers
source(output(
		maxsk as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: (concat('select max(',$SurrogateKey,') as maxsk from ',$tablename)),
	format: 'query') ~> SetMaxKey
NewMembers1 derive(businesskey1 = toString(byPosition(2)),
		name1 = toString(byPosition(6))) ~> PickCols1
ExistingMembers derive(each(match(instr(name,'ID')>0), 'surrogatekey2' = toInteger($$)),
		each(match(instr(name,'Number')>0), 'businesskey2' = toString($$))) ~> PickCols2
PickCols1, MapDrifted1 lookup(businesskey1 == businesskey2,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
isMatching split(match,
	disjoint: false) ~> checkMatch@(isMatch, noMatch)
checkMatch@isMatch derive({_LastUpdated} = currentTimestamp(),
		DWhash = sha2(256,name1)) ~> UpdateSetAttrs
PickCols2 derive(ProductID = toInteger(byName('ProductID')),
		Name = toString(byName('Name')),
		ProductNumber = toString(byName('ProductNumber')),
		Color = toString(byName('Color')),
		StandardCost = toDecimal(byName('StandardCost')),
		ListPrice = toDecimal(byName('ListPrice')),
		{_Inserted} = toTimestamp(byName('_Inserted')),
		{_LastUpdated} = toTimestamp(byName('_LastUpdated')),
		DWhash = toString(byName('DWhash')),
		surrogatekey2 = toInteger(byName('surrogatekey2')),
		businesskey2 = toString(byName('businesskey2'))) ~> MapDrifted1
Lookup1 derive(match = isMatch()) ~> isMatching
UpdateSetAttrs alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
checkMatch@noMatch keyGenerate(output(surrogatekey2 as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
Join1 derive(surrogatekey2 = surrogatekey2 + maxsk,
		{_LastUpdated} = currentTimestamp(),
		{_Inserted} = currentTimestamp(),
		DWhash = sha2(256,name1)) ~> InsertSetAttrs
SurrogateKey1, SetMaxKey join(true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
InsertSetAttrs select(mapColumn(
		Name = name1,
		{_Inserted},
		{_LastUpdated},
		each(match(name=='surrogatekey2'),
			$SurrogateKey+'' = $$),
		each(match(name=='businesskey1'),
			$keycol+'' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SetCols
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:[($keycol)],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		each(patternMatch(`.*[^_]$`))
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
SetCols sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table') ~> sink2
